item.title: Harbor Freight 30-5 Cart Lid Lock Delete Mod
item.description: I don’t use the locks on my HF 5 drawer carts and wanted to free up some extra space so I decided to delete them. This was a fairly easy mod to do since the parts are held in by small rivets that can be drilled out.

item.title: Replacements Bins for the HF 15 and 20 Bin Storage Cases
item.description: I’ve got a growing collection of nuts and bolts and started using the 20 bin storage cases (SKU: 93928) that Harbor Freight sells to keep them all organized. The bins work great for all my larger hardware such as some of my Honda bolts:

item.title: Building My Ultimate Mig Cart
item.description: I’ve had my OG mig welder for about 8 years now. It’s just a little Lincoln Power Mig 140c but the thing has been an absolute unit for only being a 110v welder.

item.title: Beefing up a Budget Bead Roller
item.description: Something I’ve been wanting for a long time is a bead roller so I can make my patch panels look more authentic. But I always had my standards set really high and thought I needed a high end motorized bead roller that can do up to 36".
